Summary: Three porthole type lights appeared then off and 6 lights appeared
divs: Sighting DetailsSaw three floresent porthole type lights appear. they turned off like a light switch then three more came on to the west and three more came back on to the east to form a very perfect horizontal line. Very cemetrical. By my calculations with other observeres the lights spaned 1 mile and could have been over 100ft in diameter. I had over 20 wittneses. Can't forget or explain this sighting.
trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Dublin
There was one other sighting in Dublin on or around November 18th 2008
